rpm.chat.real_peaceful_mode.guidance.mes: Hello, friend. Welcome to the Goldmount House.
rpm.chat.real_peaceful_mode.guidance.abo: Goldmount House is the exhibition hall of Real Peaceful Mode, Skull Craft, and EveryXDance mod, and located at the southeast of the map.
Its prototype is Haidai Building, a landmark of Qisheng Lake Park, Zibo, Shandong. You can see a very nice view here.
I hope you can enjoy your visit here. If you have any problems, please ask our staffs all over the Goldmount House.
